physics

Class Space

  • java.lang.Object
    • physics.Space

  • public class Space
extends Object
    Space contains all Nodes and Beams, and stores universal constants that apply to them all.
    Author:
    janne

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Space()
      Constructs a new Space with the default gravity and update interval.
